channel.title: Docs on Vanilla Creator
channel.description: Recent content in Docs on Vanilla Creator

item.title: Get Started
item.description: Get Started # Installation # Clone the repo # Method 1: Clone with git (Recommended) $ git clone https://github.com/VanillaCreator/VanillaCreator.git Method 2: Simply download the repo as zip and then extract it Install dependencies # Python 3 # Get it from your distro’s repo pyyaml # Install using pip $ pip install pyyaml Run # $ cd VanillaCreator $ chmod +x run.sh $ ./run.sh Then follow the init wizard to set the language and your workspace dir

item.title: Create Your First Project
item.description: Create Your First Project # A more user-friendly way to create project is still being developed, so create your project manually now :) Create a project folder # Create a new folder under your workspace folder, name it to whatever you want (however recommend to same as the project name you set later) Create project config # Create a file named project.yml under your project folder and write these in yaml format

item.title: Add Custom Receipes
item.description: Add Custom Receipes # A more user-friendly way to create project is still being developed, so create your project manually now :)
